Lines.allNPCs: Speak of which thou desire knowledge
Lines.narrationHeader: Silence, as I show what thy must see!
Lines.globalTestReply: Trust thine instincts, however deceitful they may be
Lines.globalTestHeader: Your skills will be put to a test
Lines.statInsightHeader: All your hard work has payed of... Use your insight
Lines.userMessageHeader: Whispers in the dark... be it friend or foe or thyself?
